description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Spencer Kelley - Freelance JavaScripter from Toronto

ABSTRACT
Language has rules, and the better we know them, the better we can engineer with them. With a not-shy attitude toward the well-studied but under-solved problems of natural language processing, we navigate the best-and-worst that linguistics can offer software [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/chicago-2016/presentation/Language%20as%20an%20Interface

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: GOTO 2016 • Language as an Interface • Spencer Kelley
